title: Six-year-old girl is mauled by a dog in Villawood, Sydney
text:
A six-year-old girl has been mauled by a dog in Sydney.

The dog, which appears to be a pitbull-cross, attacked the little girl in a driveway in Villawood in Sydney's west at about 10am on Saturday.

She was saved when a hero bystander jumped in and wrestled the girl free, suffering a bite would to his arm in the process.

The dog, which appears to be a pitbull-cross, attacked the little girl in a driveway in Villawood in Sydney's west at about 10am on Saturday

The girl was taken to Westmead Children's Hospital with minor cuts to her arms.

The man, 38, was taken to Liverpool Hospital.

The dog has been taken by council rangers.

Police are now investigating.
description: The dog, which appears to be a pitbull-cross, attacked the little girl in a driveway in Villawood in Sydney's west at about 10am on Saturday.
